og.description: Ray Lyons of Patrick Lyons Greenhouses planned to restore his family's trampled flower planting at the foot of the flagpole on Foxboro Common Sunday, on the eve of the town's Memorial Day observances.
og.title: Trampled under foot in Foxboro

article_metadata.description: Ray Lyons of Patrick Lyons Greenhouses planned to restore his family's trampled flower planting at the foot of the flagpole on Foxboro Common Sunday, on the eve of the town's Memorial Day observances.
